item.description:
Because of the interest we had in the October 27th investigation, which filled up quickly, I have worked with the owners to offer a second investigation on Saturday, November 17th. This will have the same format, price, and attendee limit as the first investigation. You can read all the details on the Oct. 27th meetup page.

The location has been very active lately. Here are a couple of voice box recordings that Joni, one of the investigators on our team, caught just last week:

http://soundcloud.com/jonimayhan/stairs-she-lives-in-gardner

http://soundcloud.com/jonimayhan/stairs-maddie-are-you-here

Anyone is welcome to sign up for this meetup, but I'm keeping the 1 guest restriction to give more meetup members a chance to sign up.

 

The Victorian isn't heated, so keep that in mind. You'll need to dress warmly. I will make sure we have plenty of hot coffee on hand :')

 

Thanks!

 

Sandy
item.how_to_find_us: Corner of Untion Street and Rt. 2A (W. Broadway) in South Gardner
item.name: Second Night of Investigation Available for the Gardner Haunted Victorian
